column5: Thought everyone should know   I received  a package from BPS on the gift card I won for the Tyler Auction. To my surprise there was not only one but two yes two $50.00 gift cards. Along with the cards was a nice letter of thanks for participating in the Tyler fund raiser from a George Wallace, Canadian Market Manager.  Thought this was a very nice gesture on their part and a very pleasant surprise.  The following are quotes from the letter  " As you did so generously bid $100.00 in support of charity: we in return will extend our thanks by way of providing the same Gift Card Value"  " Again thank you for thinking about the betterment of the communities we live in."  George Wallace Canadian Market Manager Bass Pro Shops
Good on ya Phil, and since you bid in Canadian dollars you got about $150 american.....  probably should spell the name right though

thats awfully nice of them! and i just got my ice hut today from tinbanger! thanks a load and nice meeting you. sorry Maureen, i'll try to send out that check tonight/tomorrow, i just got some envelopes today.   kevin
what goes around  comes around    maybe that Karma thing people were talking about has something to it
Great stuff from both sides of the transaction.  Karma isn't always a female dog  EDIT: Stupid word scanner
